content: Rocks hold so many secrets, which is why I record everything in my Travel Guide, even when {A点头}I only grasp fragments of their meaning. As long as someone keeps documenting, the right person will eventually decipher them.

content: I just heard a kind of gravelly sound I've never heard before.
